response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal interests. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price not only ensures you secure a valuable asset at a premium but also allows me to achieve my goal of maximizing the product's worth. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
